title: [1.8][87]OCS尝鲜 Infecteder-感染者 简单原版模组
author: 捌柒
txt_content:
/summon FallingSand ~ ~1 ~ {Tile:152,Time:10,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~-21 ~1 ~ ~-1 ~1 redstone_block"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"setblock ~2 ~-15 ~6 redstone_block"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~3 ~-14 ~9 command_block 0 replace {Command:"/execute @e[score_Zombie_min=1,score_Zombie=1] ~ ~ ~ /kill @e[r=5,score_Zombie_min=0,score_Zombie=0,type=!Zombie]"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~1 ~-13 ~9 command_block 0 replace {Command:"/execute @e[score_Zombie_min=1,score_Zombie=1] ~ ~ ~ /execute @e[r=5,type=!Zombie,score_Zombie=0,score_Zombie_min=0] ~ ~ ~ /summon Zombie ~ ~ ~"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~3 ~-11 ~8 command_block 0 replace {Command:"/execute @e[score_Zombie=1,score_Zombie_min=1] ~ ~ ~ /particle instantSpell ~ ~1 ~ 0.1 0.1 0.1 0.5 100"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~1 ~-10 ~8 command_block 0 replace {Command:"/kill @e[name=Infecteder]"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~3 ~-10 ~8 command_block 0 replace {Command:"/execute @e[name=Infecteder] ~ ~ ~ /scoreboard players set @e[r=1,type=Zombie] Zombie 1"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~1 ~-9 ~8 command_block 0 replace {Command:"{Name:generic.knockbackResistance,Base:100}]}"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~3 ~-7 ~7 command_block 0 replace {Command:"{Name:generic.movementSpeed,Base:1.0},"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~1 ~-6 ~7 command_block 0 replace {Command:"{Name:generic.followRange,Base:250},"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~3 ~-6 ~7 command_block 0 replace {Command:"{Attributes:[{Name:generic.maxHealth,Base:1000},"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~1 ~-5 ~7 command_block 0 replace {Command:"/execute @e[name=Infecteder] ~ ~ ~ /summon Zombie ~ ~1 ~ "}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~3 ~-3 ~6 command_block 0 replace {Command:"/scoreboard players set @a Zombie 2"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~1 ~-2 ~6 command_block 0 replace {Command:"/scoreboard players add @e Zombie 0"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~3 ~-2 ~6 command_block 0 replace {Command:"fill ~-1 ~1 ~ ~-1 ~ ~4 redstone_block 0"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~1 ~-1 ~6 command_block 0 replace {Command:"fill ~1 ~1 ~ ~1 ~ ~4 stone 0"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~ ~5 ~4 ~2 ~11 stained_glass 0"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~ ~5 ~4 ~ ~11 quartz_block 0"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~2 ~3 ~4 wall_sign 1 replace {Text1:"{text:\\"关闭系统\\",bold:False,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False,color:black,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\"fill ~2 ~-2 ~ ~-2 ~1 ~8 air\\"}}",Text2:"{text:\\"By Im87\\",bold:False,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False,color:black,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\"fill ~2 ~-2 ~ ~-2 ~1 ~8 air\\"}}",Text3:"{text:\\"\\",bold:False,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False,color:black,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\"fill ~2 ~-2 ~ ~-2 ~1 ~8 air\\"}}",Text4:"{text:\\"\\",bold:False,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False,color:black,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\"fill ~2 ~-2 ~ ~-2 ~1 ~8 air\\"}}"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/gamerule commandBlockOutput false"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/scoreboard objectives add Zombie dummy"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"setblock ~ ~-1 ~1 redstone_block"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~ ~ ~ ~25 ~1 air"}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}复制代码{:10_517:}就是想弄一个尝尝鲜，本身意义不大使用教程：
给一个生物命名为Infeceder
然后它就会拥有一系列技能，如感染周围生物，自带粒子效果之类的
如果有闲的蛋疼的人可以去尝试战胜它，指令内容不长，算是给新人一个大概的模板
